Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma-led Team India are gearing up for the Super 8 round, and their match against Afghanistan on June 20, 2024, will be crucial for them.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian batters have played the Afghanistan players often in the IPL and might read them well.
The Caribbean tracks favouring the spinners, India need to be at the top of their game to counter the Afghan challenge.
Others: Rinku Singh rolling his arm over in the Team India nets has sparked speculation that he may be the mystery spinner India is preparing to counter Afghanistan.
The Indian team is currently stationed in Barbados and is preparing to play their Super 8 opener against Afghanistan.
